description:
Automatically records your work to a secure private timeline.

Memory is Timely's tool that automatically records everything you do to your own, private timeline. It captures the time you actively spend in files, on apps, browsing websites, your calendar events, attending meetings, and more - the sky's the limit! By capturing everything you do, you get a complete picture of what you work on each day.
- [Windows] Capture email subjects in Outlook
- [Windows] Fix capturing of Firefox URLs
- [Windows] Fix Microsoft Edge capture issues when dialogs are active
- [MacOS] Warn when required permissions are missing
- [MacOS] Fix capturing issue that affected some users during meetings or with external displays
- Fix some rare crash scenarios
